articles.description: The 2024 Olympics opened in Paris in spectacular style with thousands of athletes sailing along the River Seine past lively performers on bridges, banks and rooftops in an ambitious take on an opening ceremony.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympic opening ceremony kicks off Games in unique style

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: A selection of eye-catching moments from the opening ceremony for the 2024 Olympic Games in Paris.
articles.title: Spectacular photos from the Paris 2024 Olympic opening ceremony

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Find out the day-by-day schedule from the Paris Olympics 2024 for each sport and event including athletics, swimming, football, cycling and more
articles.title: Olympics Schedule - Paris 2024 day-by-day guide of events

articles.description: Despite losing three wickets late on day one of the third Test, England can still pile on "big runs" against West Indies at Edgbaston, says Chris Woakes.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Chris Woakes positive despite Edgbaston late wickets as Gus Atkinson shines

articles.description: Canada Soccer's chief executive confirms drone use prior to Paris 2024, including at the recent Copa America.
articles.title: Olympic football: Canada used drones before Paris 2024, including at Copa America

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri seal a one-two in second practice at the Belgian Grand Prix - with Max Verstappen set for a 10-place grid drop.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri top second practice for McLaren

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says he could stay at the club beyond the end of the season, when his contract expires.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Manchester City boss could stay beyond 2024-25 season

articles.description: France full-back Melvyn Jaminet is suspended for 34 weeks and fined 30,000 euros (£25,335) by the The French Rugby Federation (FFR) after he posted a racist video on social media.
articles.title: Melvyn Jaminet: France fine and suspend full-back for 34 weeks after racist video
